message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you.
Alice, your price is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I value your offer, the product is worth significantly more to me. I could consider letting it go for $11,000.
Alice, I understand your position, but $11,000 is still a bit too much for me. I'm willing to go up to $9,000. Let's try to find some common ground.
